job_history.work_description: Monitored new trends and technologies as they applied to audit areas for 23 funds. Worked on collaborated extensively with auditors during preliminary and year-end audit processes for 23 funds. Managed accounting operations for a total of 28 funds, accounting close, account reporting and reconciliations.

Guided firm reconciliation, payroll, annual bonus, pension funds, annual reporting, and management of investments. Investigated and resolved discrepancies in monthly bank accounts while under tight deadlines. Revised and streamlined inefficient work procedures with automation software.

Tracked all capital spending against approved capital requests. Thoroughly reviewed financial statements. Verified details of transactions, including funds received and total account balances. Coded the general ledger and processed vendor invoice payments.

Maintained detailed administrative and procedural processes to improve accuracy and efficiency. Verified and logged in deadlines for responding to daily inquiries. Coordinated meetings with other department managers. Supervised and trained billing and collection staff.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in managing accounting operations, reconciliations, and guided firm reconciliation across multiple roles, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: General Accounting
skills.explanation: Over two decades of experience in various accounting roles, including managing accounting operations, account reporting, and reconciliations, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled payroll-related tasks, including payroll entries and annual bonus, in multiple roles, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Tracked capital spending, reviewed financial statements, and verified transaction details, indicating strong proficiency in financial analysis.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised and trained billing and collection staff, and coordinated meetings with other department managers, suggesting strong leadership skills.

skills.name: Process Improvement
skills.explanation: Revised and streamlined inefficient work procedures with automation software, and maintained detailed administrative and procedural processes, indicating strong proficiency in process improvement.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Verified and logged deadlines for responding to daily inquiries, and investigated and resolved discrepancies in monthly bank accounts under tight deadlines, suggesting strong time management skills.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Likely used extensively for managing financial records and payroll, but no explicit mention of expertise, suggesting a solid working proficiency.
